name: Kotmale Drinking Yoghurt Strawberry
description: Ready to Drink refreshing Kotmale Strawberry Drinking Yoghurt is made from 100% Sri Lankan, Fresh Cow's milk & real strawberry. Contains Pro Biotic. Suitable for Vegetarians. Rs.50 cents from every 1L of fresh milk collected is contributed to a special welfare fund "Sarubima" focused on empowering Farmers children through education.      *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
